name: Hyperspace (SourlessCream)
description:
Hyperspace is a super simple game that I made for the hell of it, I may continue working on the game but most likely not.  This game took about three hours to complete.  My initial inspiration for the game was Star Wars, but then I came to realize my "X-Wing" looked like the space ship in Galaga so I went with it.

It shouldn't take more than a minute to see what this game is about, just dodge the flying meatballs and see how long you can survive, my high score was about 100,000 and that only took a couple minutes to get so this game isn't hard.

Where to Play?

Play it here at https://sourlesscream.itch.io/hyperspace on any device that supports HTML5. An APK is in the process of being made, and is what the game is intended to be played on.

Credits.

Developers - SourlessCream

Music - TheFlamingDuelist

I hope you enjoy this short experience.
